price: 60. (Kani) waa Xaq ka yimid Rabbigaa, ee ha ka mid noqon shaki qabeenka.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takun mina al-mum'tarīna
